fields.Title: HQ ORB / new home shivers
fields.Condition: Variable["village.hq_clicked_orb_creak"]  and  Variable["village.hq_clicked_orb_orc"]  and  Variable["village.hq_clicked_orb_shelf"]  and  Variable["village.hq_orb_shivers_done"] == false
fields.Description: A shivers afterthought appears after you've clicked through the other orbs available inside the shack. It's a discussion of how it feels to have a new centre of operations, a free home

fields.Title: START
input
Shivers: "REVACHOL FOREVER"
fields.Dialogue Text: REVACHOL FOREVER

fields.Title: Shivers: "Overhead you hear the forlorn shrie..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Overhead you hear the forlorn shriek of seagulls. Far below the birds -- a wooden boardwalk, filled with abandoned stands, tables and benches, echoes from a long lost time.

fields.Title: Shivers: "You already were a part of their cr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You already were a part of their crew once. You can get drunk with them again. You're probably going to hang out there a lot, behind that cinder block house. It's where you belong.

fields.Title: Shivers: "Outside, the howl of the wind has p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Outside, the howl of the wind has picked up. The waves crash against the stilts again. It's as if you think the thought, but in someone else's voice...

fields.Title: Shivers: "A middle-aged man stands in a run-d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A middle-aged man stands in a run-down shack on the edge of a fishing village. Nothing nods, no one salutes him. No sight of the fugitive.

fields.Title: Shivers: "Behind the half-built cinder block..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Behind the half-built cinder block house at the other end of the village there are three people, drinking. Your *new crew*. You don't need the old crew, oh no, you have a new crew to get drunk with.

fields.Title: You: "Thank you, strange sensation, for a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Thank you, strange sensation, for a fair assessment of the current situation.

fields.Title: Shivers: "This could have been you. This coul..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This could have been you. This could still be you. A down-on-his-luck nobody, trying to survive.

fields.Title: Shivers: "A brisk coastal wind still howls ag..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A brisk coastal wind still howls against the window of the shack. Occasionally the waves crawl in under the foundation, producing a low hum...

fields.Title: Variable["village.hq_found_ruby_bullet"]
Variable["village.hq_found_ruby_bullet"]
!(Variable["village.hq_found_ruby_bullet"])
You: "My forward base for the coastal par..."
fields.Dialogue Text: My forward base for the coastal part of the operation.

fields.Title: Shivers: "A middle-aged man stands in a run-d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A middle-aged man stands in a run-down shack on the edge of a fishing village, listening to the heater hum on the wall.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mhm..." The lieutenant looks aroun..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mhm..." The lieutenant looks around.

fields.Title: makinitcleanhub
Shivers: "Waves crash unto the beach, drownin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Waves crash unto the beach, drowning the reeds. Far to the south a congregation gathers to a soup kitchen in a shelter for the homeless. An old woman gives out knitted scarves for free.

fields.Title: You: ""This feels like a cozy hideout.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "This feels like a cozy hideout."

fields.Title: You: ""This feels like a cozy hideout.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "This feels like a cozy hideout."

fields.Title: Shivers: "Who are you talking to? There is no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Who are you talking to? There is no one here. Not even cold.

fields.Title: Shivers: "Waves crash unto the beach, drownin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Waves crash unto the beach, drowning the reeds. Far to the south a congregation gathers to a soup kitchen in a shelter for the homeless. An old woman gives out knitted scarves for free.

fields.Title: You: "Shake it off. [Discard thought.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: Shake it off. [Discard thought.]

fields.Title: You: "A possible resting spot for my fugi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A possible resting spot for my fugitive is what it is.

fields.Title: You: "No, wait, I changed my mind, I want..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, wait, I changed my mind, I want to choose again.

fields.Title: Shivers: "Far away, on the corner of Perditio..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Far away, on the corner of Perdition and Main, a nondescript building, obscured in a haze. It's vacant and lost, just like its tenant.

fields.Title: Shivers: "The room feels muffled, like you pu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The room feels muffled, like you pulled your hat over your ears. Outside, it is cold and windy, but you're inside, and it feels safe and warm.

fields.Title: You: "It's free. That's good enough. I co..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's free. That's good enough. I could live here.

fields.Title: You: "Looks like this is my new home -- w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Looks like this is my new home -- wonder where the old one went?

fields.Title: Shivers: "In a small shack in the fishing vil..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In a small shack in the fishing village, a baroque heater hums quietly, emanating a sense of comforting warmth. A washbasin lies on the table, the water inside reflecting the sombre face of the world.

fields.Title: Shivers: "Far to the southeast, two men and a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Far to the southeast, two men and a woman dress themselves in ceramic armour. A shortwave radio hisses on the windowsill. One makes a salute. The other downs a drink. Weapons under the bed...

fields.Title: Shivers: "Westward, across the canal, towers..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Westward, across the canal, towers the Whirling-in-Rags. Door #1 on the second floor is locked, behind it lies a trashed room. One floor below, behind a counter, stands an irritable man.

fields.Title: You: "Listen."
fields.Dialogue Text: Listen.

fields.Title: WHATPLACE
You: "My new hangout, where I could silen..."
fields.Dialogue Text: My new hangout, where I could silently sit, drink and die while looking at the waves roll in.

fields.Title: Shivers: "WHAT IS THIS PLACE TO YOU?"
fields.Dialogue Text: WHAT IS THIS PLACE TO YOU?

fields.Title: Shivers: "LOOK UNDER THE FLOORBOARDS"
fields.Dialogue Text: LOOK UNDER THE FLOORBOARDS

fields.Title: Shivers: "There is no going back."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is no going back.
